verses.verse: <S%H8199>Judge<s%> me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7378>plead<s%> my <S%H7379>cause<s%> against an <S%H3808>ungodly<s%> <S%H2623><s%> <S%H1471>nation:<s%> O <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> and <S%H5766>unjust<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

For you are the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> do you <S%H2186>cast<s%> me off? <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy?<s%>

O <S%H7971>send<s%> out your <S%H216>light<s%> and your <S%H571>truth:<s%> let them <S%H5148>lead<s%> me; let them <S%H935>bring<s%> me to your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill,<s%> and to your <S%H4908>tabernacles.<s%>

Then will I <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H8057>exceeding<s%> <S%H1524>joy:<s%> yes, on the <S%H3658>harp<s%> will I <S%H3034>praise<s%> you, O <S%H430>God<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> are you <S%H7817>cast<s%> <S%H7817>down,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> and <S%H4100>why<s%> are you <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me? <S%H3176>hope<s%> in <S%H430>God:<s%> for I shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> him, who is the <S%H3444>health<s%> of my <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
